entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few showers. Risk of a thundershower late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thundershower early in the evening. Fog patches developing in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 11 May 2023
